name: Validate that the user can purchase a product from popular items with MasterCard

testSteps.description: 1: Validate that the user can purchase a product from popular items with MasterCard ({username=test16386, password=Prueba16386*, quantity=3, cardNumber=1020304050607080, cvvNumber=222, month=10, year=2026, cardholderName=Test})

children.description: Given that the customer enters the shopping page
actor opens the browser at https://www.advantageonlineshopping.com/

And enter your login data
| test16386 | Prueba16386* |

When select product characteristics and payment method
| 3 | 1020304050607080 | 222 | 10 | 2026 | Test |
Then customer sees Thank you for buying with Advantage message on the payment order
